name: Banjo
author: Austin Ralls
description: Adds support for Android Dex files
longdescription:
Banjo parses Dex files and disassembles them into a smali syntax that is close to [baksmali](https://github.com/JesusFreke/smali)'s.

The plugin still has rough edges. See GitHub issues for more details.
